parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being considered electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Victoria Stoiciu, identifying her as a PSD candidate for senator in Vaslui. This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The stated reach is 100K-500K, clearly indicating it targets a wide audience, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's objective is to present Victoria Stoiciu, a PSD candidate, to a large audience. The phrasing "invitata noastra speciala" (our special guest) and the description of her role as a state councilor and PSD candidate strongly suggest an intention to positively influence voters' perception of her and, consequently, their voting choices. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. It's promotional in nature, focusing on a specific candidate's attributes and candidacy.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece designed to enhance the image of a political candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1380816302896257</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Victoria Stoiciu), is used during the electoral campaign period (judging by the dates provided), has a clear electoral objective (promoting the candidate), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate these factors.  The post's promotional nature and focus on a candidate's attributes outweigh any potential argument for it being journalistic or a personal opinion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Victoria Stoiciu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Bună ziua Vaslui, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (ID postare: 1380816302896257), care promovează candidata PSD Victoria Stoiciu la funcția de senator în Vaslui, cu un efect electoral pozitiv, prin prezentarea acesteia ca „invitata noastră specială” și evidențierea rolului său de consilier de stat și candidată PSD.  Reclama, cu o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane,  a fost plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library, și are ca scop influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei menționate.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt bogdanbzv@yahoo.ro și +40760716545.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
